images.caption: Figure 1:Average score of quantized Llama-3.1-Instruct models on the Open LLM Leaderboard V1 benchmark.
Figure 2:Average score of quantized Llama-3.1-Instruct models on the Open LLM Leaderboard V2 benchmark.
Figure 3:Average score of quantized Llama-3.1-Instruct models on the Arena-Hard-Auto-v0.1.
Figure 4:HumanEval pass@1 scores for quantized Llama-3.1-Instruct models.
Figure 5:HumanEval+ pass@1 scores for quantized Llama-3.1-Instruct models.
Figure 6:Text similarity metrics comparing the outputs of quantized Llama-3.1-Instruct models to full-precision baselines. We refer to W8A8-FP as FP8, W8A8-INT as INT8, and W4A16-INT as INT4.
Figure 7:Accuracy recovery trends across academic benchmarks highlight the challenges of integer activation quantization, particularly at larger model sizes.
Figure 8:HumanEval pass@10 scores for quantized Llama-3.1-Instruct models.
Figure 9:HumanEval+ pass@10 scores for quantized Llama-3.1-Instruct models.
